description: This file defines a React functional component ReceiptUpload that provides an interface for uploading, replacing, and deleting receipt images or PDFs associated with an expense. It manages internal state for the selected file, upload/busy status, and error messages. The component interacts with external API functions to perform upload and delete operations and calls callback props upon success.

methods.name: ReceiptUpload({ expense, onUploaded, onDeleted })
methods.description: React functional component providing UI for receipt file uploads and deletions for a given expense.

ctags.name: ReceiptUpload
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ReceiptUpload({ expense, onUploaded, onDeleted }) {$/
